price: Uyu ni umuriro wa Jahanamu inkozi z’ibibi zajyaga zihinyura!
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
